author.persName: Muhammad Husain b. Khalaf al-Tabrizi, called Burhan.

msItem.title: Burhan-i Qati'.
msItem.note: (As in Storey et al.) First folio, recto: Presentation stamp of the Society, the name not filled in. Headings, entries for words and punctuation in red. Scribe is Rahm (? Rahim?) Khan son of the late Mubariz Khan, known as Mamriz (?) Khan. Work is a Persian dictionary.
msItem.incipit: Incipit,: Ay rahnama bi-har zaban dar afwah

listBibl.bibl: Entered in the Donations Register for 15 March 1834. No 12 in list of Persian MSS.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
